# Government Tender Announcement

## Overview

National Research Council Canada (NRC) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of Bittware Terabox (or equivalent) product. The tender notice was published on November 10, 2022, and the bid submission deadline is November 18, 2022, at 14:00 EST.

## Procurement Details

*   **Reference Number:** SSC-22-00020726:T
*   **Solicitation Number:** BPM017349/20726
*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Region of Opportunity:** Canada
*   **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada (SSC)

## Additional Files and Resources

*   Relevant files and resources are available on the P2P Portal: [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public)
*   Solicitation List: BPM017349

## Submission Instructions

*   Bidders must submit their proposals by November 18, 2022, at 14:00 EST.
*   For inquiries and questions, please email Raiyane Benchekroun at raiyane.benchekroun@ssc-spc.gc.ca.

## Description of the Requirement

NRC requires the procurement of Bittware Terabox product (or equivalent) to support their research and development activities. The procurement will be made through an open bidding process, and the selected bidder will be awarded a contract.
